text: Burmo-Tai, Tai-Burmans or Burmese Tai peoples is an ethnic designation of peoples living in Burma who are related to the Tai-Kadai ethnic group. The following is a list of Tai ethnic groups within the political borders of Burma: *Shan (including the Khamti people) *Dai (including the Lu people) *Lao *Tai Khun *Tai Yong *Tai Nuea (including the Tai Mao people) *Tai Laeng *Tai Phake *Tai Piw *Nara *Tenasserim Thai *Thai Yuan *Thai people Category:Tai peoples Category:Ethnic groups in Myanmar
title: Burmese Tai peoples
